name: multi-swap-dapp
description: Multi-Swap dApp with PancakeSwap and Raydium integration, NFT rewards system, and Multi-Swap Orchestrator

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd neon-solana-native-swap-demo/pancakeswap && npm install && cd ../frontend/swap-ui && npm install
scripts.test:all: npm run test:connections && npm run test && npm run test:swap && npm run test:integration && npm run test:performance && npm run test:pancakeswap && npm run test:full
scripts.setup: npm run setup:env && npm run install-all && npm run deploy
scripts.setup:full: npm run setup && npm run airdrop:help
scripts.airdrop:help: echo For testing, run: npm run airdrop YOUR_SOLANA_WALLET_ADDRESS
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run start:frontend" "echo ðŸš€ Frontend started at http://localhost:5173"
scripts.clean:
if exist dapp-config.* del dapp-config.* && if exist node_modules rmdir /s /q node_modules && if exist neon-solana-native-swap-demo\pancakeswap
ode_modules rmdir /s /q neon-solana-native-swap-demo\pancakeswap
ode_modules && if exist neon-solana-native-swap-demo rontend\swap-ui
ode_modules rmdir /s /q neon-solana-native-swap-demo rontend\swap-ui
ode_modules

author: Multi-Swap dApp Developer
